DOC.brief_summary: Overactive bladder common problem among adult woman . Darifenacin antimuscarinic drug frequently use part management condition . However , current evidence backing use limit . This study aim address Darifenacin 's effectiveness adjunct physiotherapy treating symptom due overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Darifenacin Physiotherapy Treatment Overactive Bladder Women
DOC.criteria: Patients overactive bladder diagnose confirmed urologist . Able answer ICIC , King 's Health Questionnaire Overactive Bladder Questionnaire . Able willing receive urodynamic study . History pelvic radiotherapy . Recent pelvic surgery ( < 1 year ) . History antiincontinence surgery . Pregnancy .
